Then it <S%H1961>came<s%> about on the <S%H4283>next<s%> <S%H4283>day,<s%> when <S%H6583>Pashhur<s%> <S%H3318>released<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from the <S%H4115>stocks,<s%> that <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H6583>"Pashhur<s%> is not the <S%H8034>name<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7121>called<s%> you, but <S%H3588>rather<s%> <S%H518><s%> Magor-missabib.

"For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H5414>make<s%> you a <S%H4032>terror<s%> to yourself and to <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H157>friends;<s%> and while your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%> on, they will <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of their <S%H340>enemies.<s%> So I shall <S%H5414>give<s%> over <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and he will <S%H1540>carry<s%> them <S%H1540>away<s%> as <S%H1540>exiles<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%> and will <S%H5221>slay<s%> them with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

'I shall also <S%H5414>give<s%> over <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2633>wealth<s%> of <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3018>produce,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3366>costly<s%> <S%H3366>things;<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> I shall <S%H5414>give<s%> over to the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H340>enemies,<s%> and they will <S%H962>plunder<s%> them, <S%H3947>take<s%> them away, and <S%H935>bring<s%> them to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

'And you, <S%H6583>Pashhur,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H3427>live<s%> in your <S%H1004>house<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity;<s%> and you will <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> you will <S%H4191>die,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> you will be <S%H6912>buried,<s%> you and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H157>friends<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> you have <S%H8267>falsely<s%> <S%H5012>prophesied.<s%>' "

O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Thou hast <S%H6601>deceived<s%> me and I was <S%H6601>deceived;<s%> Thou hast <S%H2388>overcome<s%> me and <S%H3201>prevailed.<s%> I have <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H7814>laughingstock<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long; <S%H3605>Everyone<s%> <S%H3932>mocks<s%> me.

But if I <S%H559>say,<s%> "I will not <S%H2142>remember<s%> Him Or <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H5750>anymore<s%> in His <S%H8034>name,<s%>" Then in my <S%H3820>heart<s%> it <S%H1961>becomes<s%> like a <S%H1197>burning<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H6113>Shut<s%> up in my <S%H6106>bones;<s%> And I am <S%H3811>weary<s%> of <S%H3557>holding<s%> [it] in, And I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201>endure<s%> [it.]

For I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1681>whispering<s%> of <S%H7227>many,<s%> <S%H4032>"Terror<s%> on <S%H5439>every<s%> <S%H5439>side!<s%> <S%H5046>Denounce<s%> [him;] yes, let us <S%H5046>denounce<s%> him!" <S%H3605>All<s%> my <S%H7965>trusted<s%> <S%H582>friends,<s%> <S%H7965><s%> <S%H8104>Watching<s%> for my <S%H6761>fall,<s%> say: <S%H194>"Perhaps<s%> he will be <S%H6601>deceived,<s%> so that we may <S%H3201>prevail<s%> against him And <S%H3947>take<s%> our <S%H5360>revenge<s%> on him."

But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is with me like a <S%H6184>dread<s%> <S%H1368>champion;<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> my <S%H7291>persecutors<s%> will <S%H3782>stumble<s%> and not <S%H3201>prevail.<s%> They will be <S%H3966>utterly<s%> <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they have <S%H3808>failed,<s%> <S%H7919><s%> With an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H3639>disgrace<s%> that will not be <S%H7911>forgotten.<s%>

Yet, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> Thou who dost <S%H974>test<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> Who <S%H7200>seest<s%> the <S%H3629>mind<s%> and the <S%H3820>heart;<s%> Let me <S%H7200>see<s%> Thy <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> on them; For to Thee I have <S%H1540>set<s%> <S%H1540>forth<s%> my <S%H7379>cause.<s%>

<S%H7891>Sing<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord!<s%> For He has <S%H5337>delivered<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H34>needy<s%> <S%H34>one<s%> From the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H7489>evildoers.<s%>
<S%H779>Cursed<s%> be the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> I was <S%H3205>born;<s%> Let the <S%H3117>day<s%> not be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> my <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> me!
